share_light.label: Share options

field_file_image_alt_text.description: Alternative text is used by screen readers, search engines, and when the image cannot be loaded. By adding alt text you improve accessibility and search engine optimization.
field_file_image_alt_text.label: Alt Text

field_file_image_title_text.description: Title text is used in the tool tip when a user hovers their mouse over the image. Adding title text makes it easier to understand the context of an image and improves usability.
field_file_image_title_text.label: Title Text

field_direct_mail_newsletter.description: Set this if the contact wants to receive direct mails
field_direct_mail_newsletter.label: Direct Mail Newsletter

title.description: Image title text, for the image's 'title' attribute.

width.description: The width of the image in pixels.

height.description: The height of the image in pixels.

country.description: Two letter ISO country code of this address.

administrative_area.description: The administrative area of this address. (i.e. State/Province)

sub_administrative_area.description: The sub administrative area of this address.

locality.description: The locality of this address. (i.e. City)

dependent_locality.description: The dependent locality of this address.

postal_code.description: The postal code of this address.

thoroughfare.description: The thoroughfare of this address. (i.e. Street address)

premise.description: The premise of this address. (i.e. Apartment / Suite number)

organisation_name.description: Contents of a primary OrganisationName element in the xNL XML.

name_line.description: Contents of a primary NameLine element in the xNL XML.

first_name.description: Contents of the FirstName element of a primary PersonName element in the xNL XML.

last_name.description: Contents of the LastName element of a primary PersonName element in the xNL XML.

target_id.description: The id of the target entity.

allowed_values.preselect: a fixed list of target(s) (supporter can't choose the target)
allowed_values.choose_one: allow the supporter to choose 1 target out of your list

revision_id.description: The field collection item revision id.

alt.description: Alternative image text, for the image's 'alt' attribute.

title.description: Image title text, for the image's 'title' attribute.

width.description: The width of the image in pixels.
